title: Uber's Fatal Self-Driving Car Crash Saga Ends With the Operator Avoiding Prison
description: After five years of purgatory, Rafaela Vasquez, the operator of a self-driving Uber that killed a pedestrian in 2018, pleaded guilty to endangerment.

title: Hands On With Google Search’s Answer to ChatGPT
description: Google’s new AI-powered search engine can feel more like artificial interference than artificial intelligence.

title: I Looked Into Sam Altman’s Orb and All I Got Was This Lousy Crypto
description: Tools for Humanity has an iris-scanning Orb that decides whether you're human or a robot—and then gives you crypto. But is Worldcoin worth the price?
